name: ShareAzureDevOpsExtension
description: Share a published extension with a Azure Devops organisation

inputs.name: connectTo
inputs.label: Connect to
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connect to Visual Studio Marketplace or a local Azure DevOps Server.

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Visual Studio Marketplace (personal access token)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service endpoint connection to install the extension.

inputs.name: connectedServiceNameAzureRM
inputs.label: Visual Studio Marketplace (workload identity federation)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service endpoint connection to install the extension.

inputs.name: method
inputs.label: Share using
inputs.helpMarkDown: Share using either an existing VSIX or using the Publisher and Extension ID.

inputs.name: publisherId
inputs.label: Publisher ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Publisher ID of the extension to be shared.

inputs.name: extensionId
inputs.label: Extension ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extension ID of the extension to be shared

inputs.name: extensionTag
inputs.label: Extension Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Extension Tag to append to the extension id

inputs.name: vsixFile
inputs.label: VSIX file
inputs.helpMarkDown: VSIX file of the extension to be shared. Supports wildcards.

inputs.name: accounts
inputs.label: Share with
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of organisations where to install the extension (e.g. org_x,org_y,org_z)

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments passed to the package and publishing tool.
